entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
